pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Metagene[![Pypi Releases](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/metagene.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/metagene)[![Downloads](https://static.pepy.tech/badge/metagene)](https://pepy.tech/project/metagene)**Metagene Profiling Analysis and Visualization**(WIP)## DEMO![demo](docs/fig_metagene.svg)- example```bashmetagene -i metagene/data/input.bed.gz -t 10 -w 7,8,9 -n a,xxx,new -F GRCh38 -b 100 -o /dev/null -s test.tsv -p test.pdf```
